entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as being surprised by Ginny's glare.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny is described as having a 'Mrs Weasley-ish glare' on her face.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as being surprised by Ginny's glare and is also the one who examines Ron's merchandise.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron appears at George's elbow with merchandise and is scolded by Ginny for telling tales about her.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George is mentioned as being the one who said 'Pygmy Puffs' and is also the one who is examining Ron's merchandise with Fred.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: Michael Corner is mentioned as someone Ginny dumped because he was a bad loser.

entities.name: pygmy puffs
entities.description: Pygmy Puffs are described as being 'really cute' and 'fairly cuddly'. They are also the subject of George's conversation with Fred.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as an example of someone who would give a glare like Ginny's.

relationships.description: Fred is scolded by Ron for telling tales about Ginny.
Ginny glares at Fred because he told her that she was moving through boyfriends too fast.
